Key Match Events: Gibraltar restricted Scotland for the first half of Monday's friendly
Wales and Poland played out a goalless draw across 120 minutes in Cardiff, only for the hosts to heartbreakingly lose on penalties
Pre-Game Insights: Wales could have few complaints when it came to missing out in the Euro 2024 playoffs
Gibraltar head into the encounter at Estadio Do Algarve in Almancil looking to end a 13-match losing streak on the international stage
Post-Match Reflections: Wales will feel the pain of watching from the sidelines when the tournament gets underway on June 14
Gibraltar will be encouraged ahead of this contest
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales will be expecting to record a convincing win
Gibraltar's increasing sturdiness highlighted by going three games without conceding in the first half
Others: Wales possible starting lineup: A.Davies; Low, Cabango, Baker; Stevens, Sheehan, J.James, Dasilva; Matondo, Cullen, Koumas
Gibraltar possible starting lineup: Hankins; Jolley, Lopes, Olivero, Sergeant, Britto; Ronan, Walker, Annesley, Scanlon; De Barr
